mapper.select: SELECT shop_idx from shop s2 where emp_id = #{param1}
SELECT count(stock_idx) from shop_stock where stock_idx = #{param1} and shop_idx = #{param2}

SELECT * FROM stock s left JOIN shop_stock ss ON s.stock_idx = ss.stock_idx left join shop s2 ON ss.shop_idx = s2.shop_idx where s.stock_sort_idx = #{param1} and (ss.shop_idx is null or ss.shop_idx = (SELECT s.shop_idx from shop s where s.emp_id = (SELECT emp_id from employee e where emp_id = #{param2})))

SELECT o.shop_idx,o.order_date ,s2.shop_name,(SELECT count(o2.stock_idx) from `order` o2 ,stock s3 where o2.order_send ='처리전' and s3.stock_sort_idx = #{stock_sort_idx} and s3.stock_idx= o2.stock_idx and o2.shop_idx = o.shop_idx and o2.order_date = o.order_date) as order_state from `order` o,stock s,shop s2 where o.stock_idx = s.stock_idx and o.shop_idx = s2.shop_idx and s.stock_sort_idx = #{stock_sort_idx} group by o.shop_idx, o.order_date,s.stock_sort_idx HAVING order_state < 1 order by o.order_date
mapper.update: UPDATE shop_stock set shop_stock_amount = shop_stock_amount + #{order_amount} where stock_idx = #{stock_idx} and shop_idx = #{shop_idx}
UPDATE `order` set order_send = '처리완료' where shop_idx = #{shop_idx} and order_date = #{order_date} and stock_idx = #{stock_idx}
UPDATE com_stock set com_stock_amount = com_stock_amount - #{order_amount} where stock_idx = #{stock_idx}
